DOC.brief_title: Study Denosumab vs. Zoledronic Acid Treat Bone Metastases Subjects With Advanced Cancer Multiple Myeloma .
DOC.criteria: Adults histologically/cystologically confirm advanced cancer include solid tumor , multiple myeloma , lymphoma Radiographic evidence least one bone metastasis ( lytic bone lesion multiple myeloma ) ; ECOG performance status 0 , 1 , 2 Adequate organ function Diagnosis breast prostate cancer Current prior intravenous bisphosphonate administration Current prior oral bisphosphonates bone metastasis , life expectancy le 6 month Prior history current evidence osteonecrosis/osteomyelitis jaw
